name: flow-vs-typescript
description: A sandbox app to experiment with various JavaScript technologies.

scripts.clean: npm run clean:out && npm run clean:bin && npm run clean:cov && npm run clean:docs
scripts.eslint:changed: git diff --name-only --diff-filter=ACMRTUB `git merge-base HEAD master` | grep '\.js$' | xargs eslint --; exit 0
scripts.babel: npm run clean:out && babel src --out-dir out; exit 0
scripts.webpack: npm run clean:bin && webpack --config webpack.config.js; exit 0
scripts.docs:js: npm run clean:docs && documentation build src/**/flow/*.js --format html --output docs
scripts.docs:ts: npm run clean:docs && typedoc src/**/typescript/*.ts --out docs
